name: collection-tools
description: This Meteor package is a tool for building "types". Select a Mongo collection, specify a schema, and a few other options such as an authentication function, and a constructor function is generated with many useful methods pre-loaded onto it (such as for generating publications and Meteor methods for adding/updating/removing with authentication baked in).
author: Jeremy Chen <convexset@gmail.com> (https://github.com/convexset/)
